DataElement.preferredName: NCCN Distress Thermometer and Problem List for Patients Version 2.2016 Past Week Distress over Family Problem of Dealing with Partner Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how distressed they have been during the past week over practical problems with dealing with partner, using a yes or no indicator.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: NCCN Distress Thermometer and Problem List for Patients Version 2.2016 Past Week Distress over Family Problem of Dealing with Partner
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A screening tool developed by the National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) Distress Management Panel used to identify patient distress coming from any source and patient problems in five categories._The most recent week, including today._A question about an individual's distress related to their family problems dealing with partner.

ObjectClass.preferredName: NCCN Distress Thermometer and Problem List for Patients Version 2.2016
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A screening tool developed by the National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) Distress Management Panel used to identify patient distress coming from any source and patient problems in five categories.

Concepts.longName: NCCN Distress Thermometer and Problem List for Patients Version 2.2016
Concepts.definition: A screening tool developed by the National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) Distress Management Panel used to identify patient distress coming from any source and patient problems in five categories.
